DOC: article-2002.txt.xml story | 0 1 2 3 | A suicide bomber sent back to his car to disarm the device by Somali police detonated it instead and killed four people.The blast was near the former Egyptian Embassy in Mogadishu.Officer Abdi Hassan said a would-be suicide car bomb was intercepted hours before the blast and the bomber arrested.But Hassan police returned him to his vehicle under orders that he disarm the explosives . a suicide bomber send back to he car to disarm the device by somali police detonate it instead and kill four people.the blast be near the former Egyptian Embassy in Mogadishu.Officer Abdi Hassan say a would-be suicide car bomb be intercept hour before the blast and the bomber arrested.But Hassan police return he to he vehicle under order that he disarm the explosive .
